ðŸ“– Summary: Bore is a simple CLI tool written in Rust for creating TCP tunnels to localhost. It allows users to expose local ports to a remote server, bypassing standard NAT connection firewalls. Bore can be self-hosted, offering an alternative to services like localtunnel and ngrok, with a focus on efficiency and ease of use.
